name: Top 40 Hits for 1961 Quiz | 1960s Music | 20 Questions

questions.text: 'A very old friend came by today 'cause he was telling everyone in town'
questions.correct: '(Marie's the Name of) His Latest Flame'
questions.explanation: '(Marie's the Name of) His Latest Flame'.

questions.text: 'Once I had a pretty girl, her name it doesn't matter'
'Here's my story, sad but true, about a girl that I once knew'
What song are these lyrics from: 'When you're young and so in love as we, bewildered by the world we see'?
'As I walk along I wonder what went wrong with our love, a love that was so strong'
'Norman , ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh, Norman, hmm, hmm, hmm, hmm, hmm, hmm, hmm, hmm, hmm, Norman, Norman, my love'
'Sa-a-a-d movies always make me cry. He said he had to work so I went to the show alone'
'Cupid draw back your bow and let your arrow go'
'It's not the way you smile that touched my heart, it's not the way you kiss that tears me apart'
'Jimmy's girl, Jimmy's girl, wish that I were holdin' Jimmy's girl'
'Mama said there'll be days like this, there'll be days like this Mama said'
'Am I fool number one or am I fool number two'
'Crazy, I'm crazy for feeling so lonely'
'From nowhere through a caravan around the campfire light'
'Ev'ry mornin' at the mine you could see him arrive'
